seo: 致远OA,任意文件上传,wpsAssistServlet,漏洞
summary: 检测致远OA系统中wpsAssistServlet接口是否存在任意文件上传漏洞，攻击者可能利用该漏洞上传恶意文件获取服务器权限
summary_en: Detect whether the wpsAssistServlet interface in the Seeyon OA system has an arbitrary file upload vulnerability. Attackers may exploit this vulnerability to upload malicious files and gain server permissions.
